rules.natural: If the Renaissance painting is forged, then it contains modern pigments
If the Renaissance painting is forged, then it does not require restoration
The Renaissance painting is either forged or authenticated as genuine
Provided that the Renaissance painting shows artificial age cracks, then it requires restoration
Should the Renaissance painting undergo chemical analysis, then it is confirmed as a forgery
If the art gallery experiences a natural disaster, then the art collection suffers water damage
The art gallery either experiences a natural disaster or the Renaissance painting is authenticated as genuine
Under the condition that the museum initiates an insurance claim, then it receives compensation
Under the condition that the museum initiates an insurance claim, then it does not receive compensation
If it is not the case that containing modern pigments leads to showing artificial age cracks, then the Renaissance painting undergoes chemical analysis
If it is not the case that experiencing a natural disaster results in no water damage, then the museum initiates an insurance claim
